stimulusHtml: Which of the following describes the result of executing the program?

features.html: Consider the following program.

choicesHtml: The program displays the sum of the even integers from 2 to 10.
The program displays the sum of the even integers from 2 to 20.
The program displays the sum of the odd integers from 1 to 9.
The program displays the sum of the odd integers from 1 to 19.
